channel.title: Comments on: Jumper
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: ljedi
item.dc:creator: ljedi
item.description: Thanks for the heads up -- I was wondering if it was worth sitting through stupid Anakin for. I hold a lot of bitter hatred for that guy's bad acting...
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the heads up — I was wondering if it was worth sitting through stupid Anakin for. I hold a lot of bitter hatred for that guy’s bad acting…

item.title: By: Echo
item.dc:creator: Echo
item.description: I went with my Little Brother. I liked it a bit better than that, but I agree that character resonance was pretty lacking. And the plot wasn't much above a comic book targeting at 13yos. Since my LB is 11, it was perfect.
item.content:encoded: I went with my Little Brother. I liked it a bit better than that, but I agree that character resonance was pretty lacking. And the plot wasn’t much above a comic book targeting at 13yos. Since my LB is 11, it was perfect.
